summary: HUD provides financial assistance to ensure that affordable rental housing is available for more than 2 million low- and moderate-income households. HUD’s Real Estate Assessment Center contracts with inspectors to ensure that the properties are clean, safe, and in good repair. However, there are concerns that the physical inspection process is not identifying troubled properties effectively. For example, the Center does not always meet its...
title: Real Estate Assessment Center: HUD Should Improve Physical Inspection Process and Oversight of Inspectors
